title: New package management system
message:
New package management system

The new system is more flexible, implements a hashing and signature verification mechanism to protect from code injection attacks, and offers the option to install packages in external storage. A single XML manifest is now used, and all the packages have been updated and some new ones added.

title: Add support for non-default TTS engines
message:
Add support for non-default TTS engines

The app now tries to use non-default TTS engines for languages not supported by the default one.

message: Update the UI when network connectivity changes

title: Resolve #4
message:
Resolve #4

Try to pre-select the system language as the source language, which seems more appropriate than setting it as the target language.

title: Workaround for a bug in the Google Search app
message:
Workaround for a bug in the Google Search app

All the supported languages are now usable in voice recognition even when the last version of Google Search is used. See https://productforums.google.com/forum/#!topic/websearch/PUjEPmdSzSE/discussion for more details.

title: Suppress the Lint error for a missing translation
message: Suppress the Lint error for a missing translation

title: Always visible card buttons
message:
Always visible card buttons

Card buttons are now disabled rather than hidden when their corresponding function is not available

title: Improve language names
message:
Improve language names

Language names are now given as string resources instead of relying entirely on those generated by java.util.Locale

title: Improve OCR memory management
message:
Improve OCR memory management

This should definitely fix all the OutOfMemoryErrors.

title: More aggressive threshold for OCR binarization
message: More aggressive threshold for OCR binarization

title: Improve memory usage for OCR
message:
Improve memory usage for OCR

A maximum resolution is now dynamically calculated so that the bitmaps don't exceed the 66.66% of the maximum heap size. This should solve most of the OutOfMemoryErrors.

title: Change paragraph splitting in OCR
message:
Change paragraph splitting in OCR

Paragraphs are now split by two or more newlines, and the rest of the newlines are removed from the text

title: Use UTF-8 for the Abu-MaTran API
message: Use UTF-8 for the Abu-MaTran API
